verbs.description: [ARG0: The law] [V: allows] [ARG1: landlords to hit tenants with repeated waves of trumped - up lawsuits — even when tenants are fully following the obligations of their lease] .
The law allows [ARG0: landlords] to [V: hit] [ARG1: tenants] [ARG2: with repeated waves of trumped - up lawsuits] — [ARGM-TMP: even when tenants are fully following the obligations of their lease] .
The law allows landlords to hit tenants with [V: repeated] [ARG1: waves] of trumped - up lawsuits — even when tenants are fully following the obligations of their lease .
The law allows landlords to hit tenants with repeated waves of [V: trumped] - up [ARG1: lawsuits] — even when tenants are fully following the obligations of their lease .
The law allows landlords to hit tenants with repeated waves of trumped - up lawsuits — even when [ARG1: tenants] [V: are] [ARG2: fully following the obligations of their lease] .

The law allows landlords to hit tenants with repeated waves of trumped - up lawsuits — even [ARGM-TMP: when] [ARG0: tenants] are [ARGM-MNR: fully] [V: following] [ARG1: the obligations of their lease] .
